IRS990.MissionDesc: EASTERN CONGO INITIATIVE (ECI) IS THE FIRST U.S. BASED ADVOCACY AND GRANT-MAKING INITIATIVE WHOLLY FOCUSED ON WORKING WITH AND FOR THE PEOPLE OF THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF CONGO (DRC). ECI'S MISSION IS TO INCREASE THE QUALITY AND QUANTITY OF INVESTMENTS INTO DRC THROUGH SUPPORTING INNOVATIVE CONGOLESE LED SOLUTIONS, DEVELOPING COLLABORATIVE PARTNERSHIPS, AND DRIVING INCREASED ATTENTION AND PUBLIC POLICY CHANGE THROUGH GRASSROOTS ADVOCACY AND HIGHLY TARGETED MEDIA ACTIVITIES. WE ENVISION A VIBRANT DRC ABUNDANT WITH OPPORTUNITIES FOR ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT, WHERE A ROBUST CIVIL SOCIETY CAN FLOURISH. ECI BELIEVES THAT LOCAL, COMMUNITY-BASED APPROACHES ARE ESSENTIAL TO CREATING A SUSTAINABLE AND SUCCESSFUL SOCIETY IN EASTERN CONGO. WE BELIEVE THAT PUBLIC AND PRIVATE PARTNERSHIPS COMBINED WITH ADVOCACY DRIVES INCREASED ATTENTION AND PUBLIC POLICY CHANGE, CREATING NEW OPPORTUNITIES FOR THE PEOPLE OF DRC.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTMAKING, BUILDING MARKETS, AND ADVOCACY: ECI WORKS WITH THE MOST INNOVATIVE COMMUNITY-BASED ORGANIZATIONS IN EASTERN DRC TO FIND CONGOLESE SOLUTIONS TO CONGOLESE CHALLENGES. WE PROVIDE GRANTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT TO HELP OUR PARTNER ORGANIZATIONS CREATE SUSTAINABLE OPPORTUNITIES FOR ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT, ACCESS TO JUSTICE, MATERNAL AND CHILD HEALTH, AND ACCESS TO EDUCATION AND INFORMATION. WE CONNECT CONGOLESE FARMERS WITH GLOBAL MARKETS FOR COFFEE AND COCOA. AND WE ADVOCATE RELENTLESSLY, IN THE U.S. AND AROUND THE WORLD, TO INCREASE THE QUALITY AND QUANTITY OF INVESTMENT IN THE LIMITLESS POTENTIAL OF THE DRC.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: WATER ACTIVITIES: THROUGH OUR ASILI SOCIAL ENTERPRISE PLATFORM, ECI PROVIDES AFFORDABLE, CONSISTENT ACCESS TO CLEAN WATER AT MEMBERSHIP-BASED KIOSKS IN SOUTH KIVU.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: HEALTH ACTIVITIES: ANOTHER ASILI SERVICE IS WORLD-CLASS PRIMARY HEALTHCARE SERVICES AT COMMUNITY CLINICS, AT PRICES LOCAL FAMILIES CAN AFFORD.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: THE 2019 COLUMN INCLUDES A SHORT PERIOD (01/01/2020-03/31/2020).

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOR THE YEAR ENDED MARCH 31, 2023, ECI HAS DOCUMENTED ITS CONSIDERATION OF FASB ASC 740-10, INCOME TAXES, THAT PROVIDES GUIDANCE FOR REPORTING UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES AND HAS DETERMINED THAT NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
EASTERN CONGO INITIATIVE - DRC EXPENSES THAT ARE INCLUDED 223,371. ON THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND EXCLUDED FROM PART IX.
GRANT TO EASTERN CONGO INITIATIVE - DRC ELIMINATED IN 221,239. CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND INCLUDED AS AN EXPENSE ON FORM 990.

GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA - ANGOLA, BENIN, BOTSWANA, BURKINA FASO,
GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT & INTRACOMPANY TRANSFER

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ECI REQUIRES THAT ITS GRANTEES SUBMIT A PROPOSAL (PRESENTATION OF THE ENTITIES, SHORT-TERM GOALS AND A DETAILED BUDGET). FINANCIAL AND NARRATIVE REPORTS ARE TO BE SUBMITTED QUARTERLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ONE CLASS OF MEMBERSHIP. THE SOLE MEMBER OF ECI IS ALIGHT, A RELATED TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALIGHT WILL HAVE THE SOLE RIGHT TO VOTE AND TO ELECT THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND REMOVE WITH OR WITHOUT CAUSE ANY DIRECTOR, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST ONE BUT UP TO TWO REPRESENTATIVES OF THE MEMBER ALSO SERVE ON THE CORPORATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S BY-LAWS MAY BE ADOPTED BY THE SOLE MEMBER OR BY MAJORITY VOTE OF THE BOARD, SUBJECT TO APPROVAL OF THE SOLE MEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN CONJUNCTION WITH INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE ORGANIZATION, THE FORM 990 WAS PREPARED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S OUTSIDE PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM. ONCE A DRAFT OF THE RETURN WAS COMPLETE, THE FORM 990 WAS REVIEWED BY MANAGEMENT AND PROVIDED TO THE GOVERNING BODY BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ADDRESSES THE TRANSACTIONS AND ARRANGEMENTS INVOLVING ECI'S DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, MEMBERS OF ANY COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND EXECUTIVE EMPLOYEES. IN ADDITION, THE POLICY COVERS ANY OTHER MANAGER OR SUPERVISOR IDENTIFIED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE PRESIDENT AS EXERCISING SUBSTANTIAL INFLUENCE OVER THE OPERATIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION. EVERY COVERED PERSON IS REQUIRED TO SIGN A STATEMENT THAT AFFIRMS THAT HE OR SHE HAS RECEIVED A COPY OF THE POLICY, HAS READ AND UNDERSTANDS IT, AND HAS AGREED TO COMPLY WITH IT, AND COMPLETES ANNUALLY A QUESTIONNAIRE DISCLOSING ACTUAL AND POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. ALL DISCLOSURES INVOLVING A TRANSACTION OR ARRANGEMENT BEING CONSIDERED AT A MEETING OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OR COMMITTEE IS MADE TO ALL MEMBERS PRESENT AT THE MEETING. ALL OTHER DISCLOSURES ARE MADE TO THE PRESIDENT. EVALUATION OF THE DISCLOSURE OCCURS AT THE BOARD OF DIRECTOR LEVEL. AN INDIVIDUAL WITH AN ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS NOT PRESENT FOR OR LEAVES ANY PORTION OF A MEETING AT WHICH THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OR A COMMITTEE IS VOTING TO DETERMINE WHETHER A CONFLICT EXISTS. IN ADDITION, THE PERSON WITH THE POTENTIAL CONFLICT IS NOT PRESENT FOR OR DOES NOT PARTICIPATES IN ANY PORTION OF A MEETING WHERE THE ISSUE IS CONSIDERED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EASTERN CONGO INITIATIVE (ECI) BENCHMARKS OFFICERS' COMPENSATION AT THE MARKET RATE FOR SIMILARLY SIZED NON-PROFIT ENTITIES IN THE WASHINGTON, D.C. AREA. ADDITIONALLY, OFFICERS' COMPENSATION IS SUBJECT TO REVIEW BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE WAS FORMED TO FORMULATE AND DISCUSS EXECUTIVE MILESTONES AND GOALS. THESE ALONG WITH THE COMPENSATION REVIEW PROCESS ARE APPROVED AND DOCUMENTED IN A BOARD MEETING WHEN AN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT IS SIGNED. THE LAST COMPENSATION REVIEW WAS IN APRIL 2020.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
